participant_1.name: George
participant_1.personality: Creative and introspective, George values music deeply and has a unique perspective on life due to his unconventional background.
participant_1.background: my name is george. i've zero family that i am close to. my favorite food is papaya. i married a super model from italy.

participant_2.name: Lily
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and passionate, Lily loves to connect with people and share her love for music and the arts.
participant_2.background: i volunteer at the homeless shelter. my father played violin professionally. i enjoy exploring new parts of the city. i am a piano teacher on the side. i play several instruments.
